feed.title: David W. Erwin
feed.subtitle: The personal website of David Erwin, an Electrical Engineering and Computer Science student in the USA and Prague.

entry.title: ai tech summit in Skopje
entry.content:
I wouldn’t be surprised

if you had no idea where Skopje even is, or if you’ve even heard of it! The capital of North Macedonia sits snugly in the heart of the Balkan region.

I managed to score free tickets to the event ($300 for standard tickets!!) by contacting a founder from TBM Group, an event planning company, and giving my pitch as to why I should be there. Lucky for me, I’m a decent salesman.

I enjoyed most of the speakers and got some really good insight from a particular PhD student named Christopher. He is working on deep learning and maps. His model (in real time) cross-references live footage with footage taken before and can accurately update even the smallest differences!

entry.title: Google Gemini updates: Flash 1.5, Gemma 2 and Project Astra

link.title: Google Gemini updates: Flash 1.5, Gemma 2 and Project Astra

entry.summary: We’re sharing updates across our Gemini family of models and a glimpse of Project Astra, our vision for the future of AI assistants.
